ARABIC: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If He wills He can dispense with you and bring about a new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He could take you away if He pleased and bring a new creation (in your place).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If He wishes, He can remove you and put in your place a new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He could replace you by a new creation if He decided to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: If He wills, He can take you away and bring other creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If He willed, He could destroy you and bring about a new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: If He please, He will take you off and bring a new generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If He will, He can put you away and bring a new creation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If He will, He can be rid of you and bring (instead of you) some new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: if He so wished, He could take you away and replace you with a new creation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: If He will, He can take you away and bring about a new creation."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If He wishes, He will take you away, and bring about a new creation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If He so pleased, He could blot you out and bring in a New Creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If He will, He could destroy you and bring about a new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He can put you away, if He will, and bring a new creation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If He wills, He can do away with you, and produce a new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:16] If He will, He can take you away and bring about a new creation, instead of you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If He will, He can be rid of you) He can destroy you, people of Mecca (and bring (instead of you) some new creation) who are better and more obedient than you.
